QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct p.ptid, ch.person_id as PersonId, lower(p.gender) gender, case when lower(p.birth_yr) = 'unknown' then null when lower(p.birth_yr) like '% and earlier' then replace(lower(p.birth_yr), ' and earlier', '') else p.birth_yr end as YearOfBirth, p.race, case when lower(p.race) = 'caucasian' then 8527 when lower(p.race) = 'african american' then 8516 when lower(p.race) = 'asian' then 8515 else 0 end as RaceConceptId, p.ethnicity, case when lower(p.ethnicity) = 'hispanic' then 38003563 when lower(p.ethnicity) = 'not hispanic' then 38003564 else 0 end as EthnicityConceptId, p.region + '_' + p.division as location_source_value, provider.provid ProviderId, e.interaction_date, 38000280 as PeriodTypeConceptId, substring(p.date_of_death, 1, 4) + '-' + substring(p.date_of_death, 5, 2) + '-01' as date_of_death, case when p.date_of_death is not null then 1 else 0 end as died, '' as cause_source_value FROM {sc}.patient p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN {sc}.provider ON provider.provid = p.provid_pcp LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter as e ON e.ptid = p.ptid order by ch.person_id
